newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA-SANITAS REGISTERS BIG BLOCK TRADE.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA-SANITAS REGISTERS BIG BLOCK TRADE.

text.p: Lithuania's stock exchange said on Thursday that a block trade of shares in pharmaceutical producer Sanitas worth 33.5 million litas was registered at 96 litas per share.
Dealers said around 50 percent of the firm was sold but could not say who bought or sold the shares.
